channel.title: Comments on: Monitoring MySQL Cluster with MySQL Enterprise Monitor
channel.description: Database technologies - especially around scalability and High Availability

item.title: By: Glenn McKay
item.dc:creator: Glenn McKay
item.description:
I am using MONyog-MySQL monitor https://www.webyog.com/ which can monitor MySQL cluster as well as Galera/Percona based cluster along with traditional MySQL server monitoring capabilities.
Quite easy to setup and start monitoring your MySQL
item.content:encoded:
I am using MONyog-MySQL monitor https://www.webyog.com/ which can monitor MySQL cluster as well as Galera/Percona based cluster along with traditional MySQL server monitoring capabilities.

Quite easy to setup and start monitoring your MySQL
